name: 17th Century Chateau and Watermill
description:
DESCRIPTION
Enjoy our 17th century Château located in the heart of the Perche region on a 350 acre property with ponds, rivers, waterfalls, forests and a 17th century watermill with its own waterfront microbrewery.
With a sleeping capacity of 37 over the entire property, our venue is ideal for destination weddings as family and friends can spend the week together to celebrate. Enjoy a game of pool, a day of fishing, and relax in the jacuzzi or by the hunt room fireplace. You are at home throughout the estate with the freedom to organize your reception to your liking!
We are a family run business who have been at the Chateau since 1928 when the family purchased the estate as a hunting property. We have since decided to rent our family home for weddings, as well as create a microbrewery on the site of our watermill so there is a lot of history to this wedding venue making it more of a home from home.
We strive to understand your needs so we can offer you a variety of options that cater to your vision.
Whether you are planning an intimate or grand wedding, we have everything you need. We can accommodate up to 220 people in our 252 m2 tent, which has lighting and wooden floor, tables and chairs (available from end of May until mid October). You can then have the after party in our barn turned dance hall which is fully equipped with a dance floor and a DJ sound system.
Contact us ! We are happy to talk about how we can best accommodate you.
